text:
Wevat | Senior Software Engineer | London, England | ONSITE, REMOTE | https://www.wevat.com

We’re on a mission to make it really easy for international travellers to get a tax refund on their shopping in Europe, starting with the UK.

 We are currently seeking a senior backend engineer. TL;DR of our stack: Java 8, Spring Boot, Kubernetes, Docker, Jenkins, AWS.   Check out the job description here: https://angel.co/wevatteam/jobs/444429-senior-backend-engine...

Interested? Send your CV and a short description of why you want to work for us to work@wevat.com and we’ll be in touch!
